title: 插件报错
author: 用笔写寂寞
txt_content:
[20:55:53] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not load 'plugins/WhitePay.jar' in folder 'plugins'
org.bukkit.plugin.InvalidPluginException: java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: io/github/white1amp/WhitePay : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.loadPlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:133) ~[kuniu.jar:git-PaperSpigot-32209cf]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:494) [kuniu.jar:git-PaperSpigot-32209cf]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:628) [kuniu.jar:git-PaperSpigot-32209cf]
Caused by: java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: io/github/white1amp/WhitePay : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0

        at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:449) ~[?:1.7.0_79]
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:71) ~[?:1.7.0_79]
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:361) ~[?:1.7.0_79]
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:355) ~[?:1.7.0_79]
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ~[?:1.7.0_79]
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:354) ~[?:1.7.0_79]

replies.author: 极光酋长
replies.txt_content:
极光酋长 发表于 2017-8-24 21:06
插件 WhitePay.jar 无法加载，请删除或更换版本或更换为同类插件。
【补充】java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError
   一般是出现在高版本编译的项目运行在低版本的Java上；

   Unsupported major.minor version 52.0
·预示您可能需要Java8的环境

replies.author: 极光酋长
replies.txt_content: 插件 WhitePay.jar 无法加载，请删除或更换版本或更换为同类插件。
